points.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
points.status: "The failure of Eaze to enforce any right or provision in this Agreement shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision unless acknowledged and agreed to by Eaze in writing." -Terms of Service

points.status:
"Last Updated: December 22, 2019

Effective Date: January 1, 2020" -Terms of Service

points.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
points.status: "If any provision of the Agreement is held to be invalid or unenforceable, you and Eaze agree that such provision shall be struck and the remaining provisions shall be enforced to the fullest extent under law." -Terms of Service

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in State of California
points.status: "This Agreement and the relationship between you and Eaze shall be governed by the laws of the State of California without regard to its conflict of law provisions." -Terms of Service

points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
points.status: "THE USE OF THE EAZE PLATFORM WILL BE SECURE, TIMELY, UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE" -Terms of Service

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
points.status: "IF YOU WISH TO OPT OUT OF PROMOTIONAL EMAILS, UNSUBSCRIBE FROM EAZE’S PROMOTIONAL EMAIL LIST BY FOLLOWING THE UNSUBSCRIBE OPTIONS IN THE PROMOTIONAL EMAIL ITSELF, INCLUDING CLICKING THE UNSUBSCRIBE LINK PROVIDED AT THE BOTTOM OF THE EMAIL." -Terms of Service

points.title: You must be 21 to view the site or if you are not, you may be directed to Google search instead of other search engines that you are using
points.status: When you're visiting the site, they may request you whether you are 21 or older and if not, you may be directed to Google search instead of other search engines that you use, but they are trying to get you out of the site. It could be that they implemented that users will go to Google search, not about to going back to your search engine that you are using. It is because that everyone uses Google every day, that's why they did that. Since this is about the main page of the site, the link in the Source is there.
